A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It could have been epic. It lacked the magic of the force awakens. The fight seens really lacked good direction. FN-2187 vs Captain Phasma blew. The kylo/rey team fight was terrible and random. So disappointed in the humor. Fin and poe are funny and they should have stuck with just those two being funny. They ruined luke. Rey did not get enough screen time. This is heartbreaking. The director just lacked vision.
